text.author: Roy Greenslade
text.description: Silvio Berlusconi, Italy's former prime minister, is eager to acquire Endemol, the creator of Big Brother and Deal or No Deal. Berlusconi's company, Mediaset, is reportedly in discussions with the company's co-founder John de Mol about a possible joint-bid for Endemol, which is worth €1.55bn and three-quarters owned by Telefonica, the Spanish phone giant. (Via Times Online: Media Industry News)
text.title: Berlusconi: deal or no deal for Endemol?

main.p: Silvio Berlusconi, Italy's former prime minister, is eager to acquire Endemol, the creator of Big Brother and Deal or No Deal. (Via Times Online: Media Industry News)
